title: It All Comes Down To THIS
body_text:
I was 20 when I first started this foam football-filled, 12-person gathering. An astronomical 199 events, 508 participants, and 8 full calendars later, I never thought the journey would come to
this
..
The MAIN EVENT: Colossal 3 vs. 3!
Six household names we've all come to befriend and respect. And in that glorious spotlight each helped create, they square off one last time:
John Tronolone, Michael "Sputz", Kevin Adams vs. Kevin Fitzpatrick, Grant Cornero, Diana DiBuccio
. No turning back, no tomorrow: this is your mega DODGEBOWL 200 main event.
"Make A Change" For ALZHEIMER'S!
ECD
will give back yet again and with your help, we can really make a change. As part of Sunrise Senior Living of Wall's annual "Walk To End Alzheimer's" fund, I'm simply asking for any coins you would like to donate to help this great cause. Every penny collected will go directly to such!
SMILE For the CAMERA!
Trust that I only want the best and that's exactly what I hired. Founder of
Michelle Amy Photography
and
ECD
legend in her own right, Michelle Mullins, will be on hand to capture the action and excitement of the multi-hour, once-in-a-lifetime spectacle. Thank you Michelle!
Winner-Take-All: RIMSHOT CONTEST
The "super" centennial secondary contest will feature the return of the classic Rimshot Contest. A special prize will be awarded to the champion - good luck to all contestants!
The ECDElite: FINAL CLASS
I've tallied all votes and picked up the personalized awards. Five of
you
reading this will become members of the prestigious
ECDElite
Hall of Fame and I cannot express enough appreciation for your sizable contributions throughout the years.
Event EXTRAS!
A special artifacts table, a kick-ass musical soundtrack everyone will enjoy, and some light food and refreshments round out this stacked extravaganza.
East Coast Dodgeball greatly improved my life beyond any number, statistic, or measure. From my current and beloved occupations to the countless lifelong friendships, it has been ever-so rewarding. I believe that even in the tiniest way, it has positively affected your life as well.
So for the last time, please come celebrate
our
tremendous accomplishment; all of us, together, have made this possible.
body_html:
I was 20 when I first started this foam football-filled, 12-person gathering. An astronomical 199 events, 508 participants, and 8 full calendars later, I never thought the journey would come to this ..



The MAIN EVENT: Colossal 3 vs. 3!
Six household names we've all come to befriend and respect. And in that glorious spotlight each helped create, they square off one last time: John Tronolone, Michael "Sputz", Kevin Adams vs. Kevin Fitzpatrick, Grant Cornero, Diana DiBuccio. No turning back, no tomorrow: this is your mega DODGEBOWL 200 main event.

"Make A Change" For ALZHEIMER'S!
ECD will give back yet again and with your help, we can really make a change. As part of Sunrise Senior Living of Wall's annual "Walk To End Alzheimer's" fund, I'm simply asking for any coins you would like to donate to help this great cause. Every penny collected will go directly to such!

SMILE For the CAMERA!
Trust that I only want the best and that's exactly what I hired. Founder of Michelle Amy Photography and ECD legend in her own right, Michelle Mullins, will be on hand to capture the action and excitement of the multi-hour, once-in-a-lifetime spectacle. Thank you Michelle!

Winner-Take-All: RIMSHOT CONTEST
The "super" centennial secondary contest will feature the return of the classic Rimshot Contest. A special prize will be awarded to the champion - good luck to all contestants!

The ECDElite: FINAL CLASS
I've tallied all votes and picked up the personalized awards. Five of you reading this will become members of the prestigious ECDElite Hall of Fame and I cannot express enough appreciation for your sizable contributions throughout the years.

Event EXTRAS!
A special artifacts table, a kick-ass musical soundtrack everyone will enjoy, and some light food and refreshments round out this stacked extravaganza.




East Coast Dodgeball greatly improved my life beyond any number, statistic, or measure. From my current and beloved occupations to the countless lifelong friendships, it has been ever-so rewarding. I believe that even in the tiniest way, it has positively affected your life as well.

So for the last time, please come celebrate our tremendous accomplishment; all of us, together, have made this possible.
